title: Little League Phenom Takes Her Exit, But The Series Goes On
teaser: There has been no bigger sports star lately than Mo'ne Davis. The 13-year-old pitcher charmed — and dominated — on the mound in the Little League World Series. But her Little League journey ended Thursday, when her underdog squad lost to a team from Chicago. Sportswriter Stefan Fatsis offers his take.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
